column4: I'm on 10.04, 64 bit and I can't get flash to work. I've installed the flashplugin-installer package but I still can't watch youtube videos or do anything with flash
can anyone offer help with getting flash (even if its via gnash) working on a 64 bit Ubuntu install?
i just install it via the package manager and it works..
as I stated above, I already did that and it doesn't wrok
